declarations.summary: The base element used for constructing layouts. Not to be rendered itself.

`

members.name: random

attributes.description: A CSS length value for the border’s width

declarations.name: CloneElement

members.name: random

attributes.description: Corresponds to the id of the template element whose content’s should be cloned
attributes.name: of

declarations.name: RepeatElement

members.name: random

attributes.description: A string representing an integer or a range in the form `[integer]-[integer]`. The total number of instances of the content after repetition has occurred.
attributes.name: total

declarations.summary: Repeats content of any kind. Renders with `display: content`, so it does not affect layout.

declarations.name: DotsElement

members.name: random

attributes.description: A CSS size value representing the space taken up by each part of the pattern
attributes.name: size

attributes.description: A float between 0 and 1 representing the radius of the dot relative to the size of the pattern
attributes.name: radius

declarations.summary: A mask that applies a dotted pattern to descendant elements

declarations.name: StripesElement

members.name: random

attributes.description: A CSS size value representing the width of each stripe
attributes.name: width

attributes.description: A CSS size value representing the space between each stripe
attributes.name: space

declarations.summary: A mask that applies a striped pattern to descendant elements

slots.description: The content to appear at the start (typically left) of the inline axis
slots.name: start

slots.description: The content to appear at the end (typically right) of the inline axis

members.name: random

attributes.description: The width of the sidebar where there is room to accommodate one
attributes.name: sidewidth

attributes.description: The width of the non-sidebar, as a percentage of the container, at which it should wrap
attributes.name: threshold

attributes.description: Treat the end (typically right) content as the sidebar
attributes.name: end

declarations.summary: Wraps two elements, with one acting as a sidebar and the other taking up the remaining space
